about_the_game:
BONUS: Receive the exclusive Tigris Onyx Skin and Tigris Weapon for free! (Limit one per account.)

500 Platinum to use towards new Warframes, Weapons, Equipment and more
60,000 Credits to assist in making new upgrades to your Arsenal
6 Random Mod Cards to instantly upgrade your Arsenal
4 Rare Mod Cards to add hard-to-find modifications to your Inventory
Reflex Guard Mod grants a chance for the Warframe to automatically parry incoming attacks
Heavy Impact Mod to create seismic shockwaves from heavy landings to knock foes off their feet
2 Exilus Adapters to instantly unlock an Exilus Mod Slot for Mobility and Utility advancements
3-Day Affinity and Credit Booster to quickly level up your Arsenal

*The stats displayed in the above Mod images depict Max Rank stats all new Mods start Unranked
detailed_description:
BONUS: Receive the exclusive Tigris Onyx Skin and Tigris Weapon for free! (Limit one per account.)

500 Platinum to use towards new Warframes, Weapons, Equipment and more
60,000 Credits to assist in making new upgrades to your Arsenal

4 Rare Mod Cards to add hard-to-find modifications to your Inventory
Reflex Guard Mod grants a chance for the Warframe to automatically parry incoming attacks
Heavy Impact Mod to create seismic shockwaves from heavy landings to knock foes off their feet
2 Exilus Adapters to instantly unlock an Exilus Mod Slot for Mobility and Utility advancements

name: Warframe: Reflex Guard Pinnacle Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:25 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The Reflex Guard Pinnacle Pack allows you to advance more quickly in Warframe with Platinum, Credits, Mod Cards and more! BONUS: Get the Steam-exclusive Tigris Onyx Skin and the Tigris Weapon for free!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
